excerpt: "Kosei Tomita, who originally voiced the anime character Doraemon in 1973, died on Sept. 27. He was 84 years old. A statement from his agency said that Tomita died after suffering a stroke. He began his career as a voice actor in 1963 wherein he voiced numerous animes including “Doraemon,"
